metadata.synopsis: Evil Ending if the player is a mind flayer and chooses to take control of the netherbrain. They can have been a mind flayer since the decision, or they could have turned into a mind flayer upon failing a saving throw in END_BrainBattle_FinalDecision_Nested_EvilAvatar

3.text: *This is but the first conquest. Every realm shall quake at your power. Every tongue shall speak your name in awe. Every god shall perish in your shadow. This world is yours. Now for the rest.*
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Mind Flayer player looks at the massed thralls around and the fleet of nautiloids dotted across the skyline. They pulse out a psionic command to all.

2.speaker: Narrator
2.text: *This is but the first conquest. Every realm shall quake at your power. Every tongue shall speak your name in awe. Every god shall perish in your shadow. This world is yours. Now for the rest.*
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: A tadpole vat floats/is wheeled into view, flanked by two mind flayers. It is placed before the kneeling masses. The glow from within the vat illuminates their faces. The mind flayer player gestures them to reach in. One NPC  does so, and withdraws her hand with a tadpole. She raises it towards her eye...

4.context: CinematicNodeContext: A tadpole vat floats/is wheeled into view, flanked by two mind flayers. It is placed before the kneeling masses. The glow from within the vat illuminates their faces. The mind flayer player gestures them to reach in. One NPC  does so, and withdraws her hand with a tadpole. She raises it towards her eye...

1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Time cut to: ranks of newborn mindflayers are now assembled, moving towards  the archways leading out of the city. Above the rooftops, a nautiloid rises into the sky.

0.context: CinematicNodeContext: High above, the mind flayer player is atop the Netherbrain once again. They watch as Nautiloids full of their new army rise upwards.
